Class Customer

java.lang.Object
model.Customer
public class Customer extends Object
Represents a user/customer in the convenience store. Updated to support user authentication and membership cards.
Version:
1.0
Author:
BENITO_RAMOS

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Customer()
    Constructs a guest Customer object.

    Constructs a Customer object from ID and name (backward compatibility).
    Customer(String userID, String lastName, String firstName, String middleName, String password)
    Constructs a Customer object with user ID and name.

  • Constructor Details

    • Customer

      public Customer(String userID, String lastName, String firstName, String middleName, String password)
      Constructs a Customer object with user ID and name.
      Parameters:
      userID - (String) The user's unique ID.
      lastName - (String) The user's last name.
      firstName - (String) The user's first name.
      middleName - (String) The user's middle name (can be null/empty).
      password - (String) The user's password.

    • Customer

      public Customer()
      Constructs a guest Customer object.

    • Customer

      public Customer(String userID, String name)
      Constructs a Customer object from ID and name (backward compatibility). This is for old console code that doesn't use authentication.
      Parameters:
      userID - (String) The user's ID.
      name - (String) The user's full name.

      public void setName(String lastName, String firstName, String middleName)
      Updates the user's name.
      Parameters:
      lastName - (String) The new last name.
      firstName - (String) The new first name.
      middleName - (String) The new middle name.

      public void setPassword(String password)
      Updates the user's password.
      Parameters:
      password - (String) The new password.

    • getMembershipCardID

      public String getMembershipCardID()
      Returns the membership card ID.
      Returns:
      (String) The membership card ID, or null if none.

    • getMembershipCard

      public MembershipCard getMembershipCard()
      Returns the membership card (for backward compatibility).
      Returns:
      (MembershipCard) A virtual membership card object, or null if none.

    • getCardExpiryDate

      public LocalDate getCardExpiryDate()
      Returns the card expiry date.
      Returns:
      (LocalDate) The card expiry date, or null if none.

    • getPoints

      public int getPoints()
      Returns the user's points.
      Returns:
      (int) The current points balance.

    • isGuest

      public boolean isGuest()
      Checks if the user is a guest.
      Returns:
      (boolean) True if guest user.

    • getIsSenior

      public boolean getIsSenior()
      Returns whether the customer is eligible for senior/PWD discount. This is now per-transaction only, not stored.
      Returns:
      (boolean) Always false, since senior/PWD is per-transaction.

    • assignMembershipCard

      public void assignMembershipCard(String cardID, LocalDate expiryDate)
      Assigns a membership card to the user.
      Parameters:
      cardID - (String) The membership card ID.
      expiryDate - (LocalDate) The card expiry date.

    • assignMembershipCard

      public void assignMembershipCard(MembershipCard card)
      Assigns a membership card to the user (backward compatibility).
      Parameters:
      card - (MembershipCard) The membership card to assign.

    • setIsSenior

      public void setIsSenior(boolean seniorStatus)
      Sets the senior/PWD status for the customer. Note: This is now per-transaction only, not stored.
      Parameters:
      seniorStatus - (boolean) Ignored, kept for backward compatibility.

    • hasMembership

      public boolean hasMembership()
      Determines if the customer has a valid membership card.
      Returns:
      (boolean) True if the customer has a valid membership card.

    • earnPoints

      public void earnPoints(double amount)
      Adds points to the user's account.
      Parameters:
      amount - (double) The total amount spent.

    • usePoints

      public double usePoints(int pointsToUse)
      Uses points for a discount.
      Parameters:
      pointsToUse - (int) The number of points to use.
      Returns:
      (double) The discount amount (1 point = 1 peso).

    • refundPoints

      public void refundPoints(int refundedPoints)
      Refunds points back to the user (for cancelled transactions).
      Parameters:
      refundedPoints - (int) The number of points to refund.

    • setPoints

      public void setPoints(int points)
      Sets the user's points (for staff editing).
      Parameters:
      points - (int) The new points balance.

    • getLastActivityDate

      public LocalDate getLastActivityDate()
      Gets the last activity date.
      Returns:
      (LocalDate) The last activity date.

    • setLastActivityDate

      public void setLastActivityDate(LocalDate date)
      Sets the last activity date.
      Parameters:
      date - (LocalDate) The last activity date.

      public String getSummary()
      Returns a summary string for displaying customer details.
      Returns:
      (String) A formatted string.
